idea-plugin.name: IntelliJDeodorant
idea-plugin.description:
An IntelliJ IDEA plugin that detects code smells and recommends appropriate refactorings to resolve them. Based on tsantalis/JDeodorant.

Currently, the plugin supports two code smells, namely Feature Envy and Long Method.

  • Feature Envy problems can be resolved by appropriate Move Method refactorings.
  • Long Method problems can be resolved by appropriate Extract Method refactorings.
